SELECT a.booking_id AS bookingId, a.actual_paid AS finalPayment ,
c.title AS strfTitle, d.pic_name AS strfPic, CONCAT( DATE_FORMAT(a.check_in, '%Y-%m-%d ('), CASE DAYOFWEEK(a.check_in) WHEN 1 THEN '일' WHEN 2 THEN '월' WHEN 3 THEN '화' WHEN 4 THEN '수' WHEN 5 THEN '목' WHEN 6 THEN '금' WHEN 7 THEN '토' END, DATE_FORMAT(a.check_in, ') %H:%i') ) AS checkIn, CONCAT( DATE_FORMAT(a.check_out, '%Y-%m-%d ('), CASE DAYOFWEEK(a.check_out) WHEN 1 THEN '일' WHEN 2 THEN '월' WHEN 3 THEN '화' WHEN 4 THEN '수' WHEN 5 THEN '목' WHEN 6 THEN '금' WHEN 7 THEN '토' END, DATE_FORMAT(a.check_out, ') %H:%i') ) AS checkOut, IF(e.review_id IS NULL, 0, 1) AS reviewStatus, CASE WHEN a.check_out > NOW() THEN 'progress' -- 진행 중인 예약 ELSE 'completed' -- 완료된 예약 END AS bookingStatus FROM booking a JOIN menu b ON a.menu_id = b.menu_id JOIN stay_tour_restaur_fest c ON b.strf_id = c.strf_id LEFT JOIN strf_pic d ON b.strf_id = d.strf_id LEFT JOIN review e ON e.strf_id = b.strf_id WHERE a.user_id = #{userId} GROUP BY a.booking_id, c.title, a.check_in, a.check_out, a.actual_paid ORDER BY a.check_out DESC;

SELECT c.title AS strfName , d.pic_name AS picName, b.price FROM booking a JOIN menu b ON a.menu_id = b.menu_id JOIN stay_tour_ restaur_fest c ON b.strf_id = c.strf_id JOIN strf_pic d ON b.strf_id = d.strf_id WHERE booking_id = #{bookingId}
